oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tall Tales - #28 - 'The Tweetsie'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Tall Tales, episode #28. Featuring the tale 'The Tweetsie', written by Bill Woolsey, read by Bobby Wiener, produced by Marjorie Cooney, with ballad singer George Grise. Original broadcast date of May 4, 1954.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Grise
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: On Top Of Old Smoky (George Grise) -- Opening statement (Bobby Wiener) -- 'The Tweetsie' (Bobby Wiener) -- 900 Miles (George Grise) -- 'The Tweetsie' (Bobby Wiener) -- The Ballad Of John Henry (George Grise) -- 'The Tweetsie' (Bobby Wiener) -- She'll Be Coming 'Round The Mountain (George Grise) -- 'The Tweetsie' (Bobby Wiener) -- The Railroad Cars Are Coming (George Grise) -- 'The Tweetsie' (Bobby Wiener) -- 900 Miles (George Grise) -- On Top Of Old Smoky (George Grise) -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Tall tales (Radio program); Woolsey, Bill; Grise, George O.; Cooney, Marjorie
